column2:
""فقال لها يا مريم"( يوحنا 16:20)

تدعوكم كنيسة السيدة العذراء مريم بأرض الجولف لحضور خدمة درب الصليب  لعام 2015  

أيام الخدمة : 
الأربعاء 04/01 
الخميس 04/02
الجمعة 04/03

- مواعيد توزيع الدعاوي  : 
الجمعة 03/27  الساعة 12 م
السبت 03/28 الساعة 6 م 
الأحد  03/29 الساعة 12 م

                       صلوا من اجل الخدمة :)

Parthenians,

Next Tuesday, we are honored by the presence of Fr. Bishoy Edward, who will be discussing with us:

The Strongest Wireless Connection

Don't miss the chance to be part of the discussion!

Ladies and Gentlemen, 
We are delighted to invite you all to our engagement. The celebration will be held at St Mark's Church Cleopatra on Saturday, February 8th at 1:00 p.m. The presence of each and every one of you will mean a lot to us! Looking forward to seeing you ALL :)

Ehab & Dina

For those who would like to watch it live online... Follow the link below 

http://www.stmarkos.org/stmarkos/index.php?lang=ar

And click on "LIVESTREAM"
